content.question: Which of the following statements best explains why there are fewer colonies on plate IV than on plate III?

choices.label: Plate IV is the positive control.
Not all E. coli cells are successfully transformed.
The bacteria on plate III did not mutate.
The plasmid inhibits E. coli growth.

content.answer: Not all E. coli cells are successfully transformed.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
